name: monitoring-saas
description: A full-stack monitoring SaaS application designed to track uptime, SSL certificates, and system health. The app provides real-time monitoring, job queue processing, and a dashboard to visualize metrics. Built with a modern stack for scalability and extensibility.

scripts.deps:install: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix monitoring-frontend
scripts.stop:redis: docker stop monitoring-redis && docker rm monitoring-redis
